root.texto: The time my body count went from 0 to 3 in a week #thread #storytime https://t.co/nqjiWBUubs I'm 18 yrs old. Fresh out of highschool. I'm a virgin. I'd been known for it through out my 4 YRS in highschool, unlike my 2 BFF's at the time marisa & claire. THOSE HOES. Ughhhh #badinfluences Fr https://t.co/UGBXnPUX1l Sooooo i'd been dating this guy, we'll call him #1. He was sweet, kind, thoughtful, caring & I THOUGHT THAT MF was the one !!!!!!!!! But *buzzer* ehhhh wrong https://t.co/SFDbbPhWa7 Boom!! It's prom night. EVERYBODY got drunk & shit. I had a few drinks but, I did NOT get drunk like at all My 2 BFFs were KNOWN for hooking up with ALL TYPES of nigga!!! But my dumb ass ain't believe it! Soo, yeah it's prom & everybody goes to the hotel. Claire & marisa go back to hotel EARLY, they were THAT drunk & my bf #1 being the kind nigga he is drove them! How sweet!! https://t.co/op1ITknID1 #1 told me he'd come get me later bc I "looked like I was having fun" sooo yea he left. The prom has been over for an hour now & I'M STILL HERE sitting on the curb in a PRETTY ASS DRESS !!!!!!!! Mad as FUCK ******plottin plottin plottin plottin****** I FINALLY just call an uber. The uber got there in 5 minutes. My ass fell asleep in the uber !!!!!! Anyways, we pulled up. I got out & went up to my bf& I's room & BITCHHH GUESS WHAT I SAW https://t.co/yRoOFl1sc3 THEM 3. In the bed. Kissing. All over eachother. I WAS HEATED AS FUCK! A bitch ain't NEVER been this MAD !!!!!!!! I got my shit & left. #1 followed me to "talk to me" while marisa & claire stayed in the room. There was weed & alchol EVERYWHERE !!!! #1 agreed to take me home & as soon as we pulled off, I called they asses in for underaged drinking AND possession of marijuana !!!! Haha BITCH https://t.co/AjlnZtol0j (This was SATURDAY night by the way) So, #1 took me home. The VERY next day is when I met #2. We were talking for a few days & he asked to come over. I said WHY THE FUCK NOT???! Deadass likeeee https://t.co/hgB1ycSLUd I ended up losing my virginity. SEX WAS GREAT. His personality was WACK asf. I was BORED the whooole lil evening. Whatever thoooo a bitch was feelin good soo I was likeeee â€” FUCK it !!!!! https://t.co/0RvQbFoCb0 I met #2 on that sunday, THEN I MET #3. HE WAS SO PERFECT. Omg. I loved him. Like fr. BITCHHH HE MY MAN NOW, that is how fr I am. I met #3 on that monday. He was sooo FINE. We went on a REAL FIRST DATE at a NICE ass place & he had a place we went there AFTER! I was EXCITED ASF https://t.co/oHKCyf8PpS OF COURSE. We fucked in his COMFY ASS BED !!!!!!! Yas BITCHsfhjkksd! He was WAY BETTER THAN my FIRST!!! I was spruuuuung or whatevaaaa! https://t.co/f5OLwMRadA So, I slept over his house until thursday & I LOVED THAT SHIT !!!! Except, a bitch KEPT throwing up! Like none stop ONLY in the morningggg!!!! I was wore out from THAT SHIT HE suggested I go get a pregnancy test. I did it, but I was like "NIGGA I AM NOTT PREGNANT" & BITCHHH GUESS WHAT https://t.co/HL3XS7j57M I was. I was pregnant. REMEMBER WHEN I SAID I WAS PLOTTIN? Like before I was pregnant??! Sooooo, my man was on the SAME PAGE as me https://t.co/XUWefDz6rM So, MY MASTER PLAN. It's Thursday. I fucked #2. I fucked #3. He had a part time, GOOD paying job. I texted #1 & asked to come over later & you know, I GAVE IT UP. Sooo. That next Saturday, I texted the 2, told them I was pregnant, sent them the pic of the test & asked for 8,000. $8,000 + $8,000 = $16,000 = a lot of damn money They sent that shit within 2 days. My man & I were set. I went to the doctor the next day for a follow up on my pregnancy & the doctor told me: "I'm sorry, ma'am. You're not pregnant" https://t.co/lnVUBeqW5M I WALKED OUT THAT BITCH SO FAST!!! Deadass like â€” BITCHHHHHH !!!!!!!! I was sooooo fuckin relieved. Pregnancy ain't no joke!!!! Even tho I ain't go through that shit https://t.co/JyeanZf1xZ Moral of the story, idek ðŸ’€ðŸ’€ðŸ’€ðŸ’€ðŸ’€ðŸ’€ðŸ’€ðŸ’€ðŸ’€ðŸ’€ðŸ’€ðŸ’€ðŸ’€ðŸ’€ðŸ’€ðŸ’€ðŸ’€ðŸ’€ðŸ’€ðŸ’€ðŸ’€ðŸ’€ðŸ’€ THIS SHIT SAD tbh & I have NOTHING else to say but, BITCH GET YO COINS!!! ðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜Š THE ENDðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜Š https://t.co/ByM0WF8J1D
